plot: The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.
title: "Mystery Science Theater 3000" Master Ninja I

plot_en: The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.

cast.role: Crow T. Robot /              Dr. Clayton Forrester
cast.name: Trace Beaulieu
